title: Looking for a silver duo support main
body:
I am looking for silver duo support main. Considering I main adc, this would be perfect. You need to not rage constantly in game, actually know how to peel and ward, also when to play aggressive and when to play defensive. You must have skype as well. You also must be relatively active... i.e at least 12 hours a week.

SUPPORT MAIN

IGN:
Age:
Favourite Champion:
How long have you mained support:
Skype name (so I can add you):

replies.body:
I don't main support but I'm pretty good for the Silver elo (I used to main last year but changed to mid, I still know what I'm doing though and I'd be happy to play support for you).
IGN: Alegria
Age: 16
Favourite Champion: Janna, Nami, Raka.
Skype Name: AlegriaOCE

Sure, are you online alot?
Ill add you by the way.

I usually am online quite often. I'm in Year 11 though so sometimes I might not be on for a few days because I just get piled with homework and assessments. I usually play heaps on Friday-Sunday though.
Ok, so you're the exact same as me. Rightio.

I swear I just saw this post on another user.....


Edit:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/U8gsfewq-silver-duo-looking-for-support-main
found it lol
That's weird o.0 I didn't repost?
